quote:
It is better to conquer yourself than to win a thousand battles. Then the victory is yours. It cannot be taken from you.” -Buddha
“If you knew what I know about the power of giving you would not let a single meal pass without sharing it in some way.
Learn this from water: loud splashes the brook but the oceans depth are calm.
author: Unknown

quote: I never see what has been done; I only see what remains to be done.
author: Unknown

quote: You only lose what you cling to.
author: Unknown

quote: The past is already gone, the future is not yet here. There’s only one moment for you to live.
author: Unknown

quote: The trouble is, you think you have time.
author: Unknown

quote: As you walk and eat and travel, be where you are. Otherwise you will miss most of your life.
author: Buddha

quote: Your work is to discover your work and then with all your heart to give yourself to it.
author: Unknown

quote: Believe nothing, no matter where you read it, or who said it, no matter if I have said it, unless it agrees with your own reason and your own common sense.
author: Unknown

quote: The tongue like a sharp knife… Kills without drawing blood.
author: Unknown

quote: Teach this triple truth to all: A generous heart, kind speech, and a life of service and compassion are the things which renew humanity.
author: Unknown

quote: Every human being is the author of his own health or disease.
author: Buddha

quote: To abstain from lying is essentially wholesome.
author: Unknown

quote: Avoid evil deeds as a man who loves life avoids poison.
author: Unknown

quote: Holding onto anger is like drinking poison and expecting the other person to die.
author: Unknown

quote: What you think, you become. What you feel, you attract. What you imagine, you create.
author: Unknown

quote: Meditation brings wisdom; lack of meditation leaves ignorance. Know well what leads you forward and what holds you back, and choose the path that leads to wisdom.
author: Buddha

quote: There are only two mistakes one can make along the road to truth; not going all the way, and not starting.
author: Unknown

quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
author: Unknown

quote: If a man’s thoughts are muddy, If he is reckless and full of deceit, How can he wear the yellow robe? Whoever is master of his own nature, Bright, clear and true, He may indeed wear the yellow robe.
author: Unknown

quote: Anger will never disappear so long as thoughts of resentment are cherished in the mind. Anger will disappear just as soon as thoughts of resentment are forgotten.
author: Unknown

quote: Your body is precious. It is our vehicle for awakening. Treat it with care.
author: Buddha

quote: For soon the body is discarded, Then what does it feel? A useless log of wood, it lies on the ground, Then what does it know? Your worst enemy cannot harm you As much as your own thoughts, unguarded. But once mastered, No one can help you as much, Not even your father or your mother.
author: Unknown

quote: One should strive to understand what underlies sufferings and diseases – and aim for health and well-being while gaining in the path.
author: Unknown

quote: If you are quiet enough, you will hear the flow of the universe. You will feel its rhythm. Go with this flow. Happiness lies ahead. Meditation is key.
author: Unknown

quote:
Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.” -Buddha
“Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace.
author: Unknown

quote: There has to be evil so that good can prove its purity above it.
author: Unknown

quote: To conquer oneself is a greater task than conquering others.
author: Unknown

quote: The whole secret of existence is to have no fear. Never fear what will become of you, depend on no one. Only the moment you reject all help are you freed.
author: Unknown

quote: Set your heart on doing good. Do it over and over again and you will be filled with joy.
author: Buddha

quote: Everything that has a beginning has an ending. Make your peace with that and all will be well.
author: Unknown

quote: The root of suffering is attachment.
author: Unknown

quote: You cannot travel the path until you have become the path itself.
author: Unknown

quote: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
author: Buddha

quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
author: Unknown

quote: Purity or impurity depends on oneself. No one can purify another.
author: Unknown

quote: However many holy words you read, However many you speak, What good will they do you If you do not act on upon them?
author: Unknown

quote: If you light a lamp for somebody, it will also brighten your path.
author: Buddha

quote: If we could see the miracle of a single flower clearly, our whole life would change.
author: Unknown

quote: Those who have failed to work toward the truth have missed the purpose of living.
author: Unknown

quote: In separateness lies the world’s greatest misery; in compassion lies the world’s true strength.
author: Unknown

quote: If you find no one to support you on the spiritual path, walk alone. There is no companionship with the immature.
author: Unknown

quote: Work out your own salvation. Do not depend on others.
author: Unknown

quote: However many holy words you read, However many you speak, What good will they do you If you do not act on upon them?
author: Unknown

quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought. The mind is everything. What we think we become.
author: Buddha

quote: All wrong-doing arises because of mind. If mind is transformed can wrong-doing remain?
author: Unknown

quote: It is a man’s own mind, not his enemy or foe, that lures him to evil ways.
author: Unknown

quote: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think. When the mind is pure, joy follows like a shadow that never leaves.
author: Unknown

quote: There is nothing so disobedient as an undisciplined mind, and there is nothing so obedient as a disciplined mind.
author: Unknown

quote: Your worst enemy cannot harm you as much as your own unguarded thoughts.
author: Unknown

quote: You will not be punished for your anger, you will be punished by your anger.
author: Unknown

quote: To understand everything is to forgive everything.
author: Buddha

quote: Wear your ego like a loose fitting garment.
author: Unknown

quote: People with opinions just go around bothering one another.
author: Unknown

quote: Speak or act with an impure mind and trouble will follow you.
author: Unknown

quote: In the sky, there is no distinction of east and west; people create distinctions out of their own minds and then believe them to be true.
author: Unknown

quote: The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, worry about the future, or anticipate troubles, but to live in the present moment wisely and earnestly.
author: Unknown

quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty…otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear
author: Unknown

quote: There is nothing more dreadful than the habit of doubt. Doubt separates people. It is a poison that disintegrates friendships and breaks up pleasant relations. It is a thorn that irritates and hurts; it is a sword that kills.
author: Unknown

quote: If the problem can be solved why worry? If the problem cannot be solved worrying will do you no good.
author: Unknown

quote: Even death is not to be feared by one who has lived wisely.
author: Unknown

quote: In the end these things matter most: How well did you love? How fully did you live? How deeply did you let go?
author: Buddha

quote: A man is not called wise because he talks and talks again; but is he peaceful, loving and fearless then he is in truth called wise.
author: Unknown

quote: Even as a solid rock is unshaken by the wind, so are the wise unshaken by praise or blame.
author: Unknown

quote: It is better to travel well than to arrive.
author: Unknown

quote: Pain is certain, suffering is optional.
author: Buddha

quote: A dog is not considered a good dog because he is a good barker. A man is not considered a good man because he is a good talker.
author: Unknown

quote: Remembering a wrong is like carrying a burden on the mind.
author: Unknown

quote: Every morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.
author: Unknown

quote: Nothing ever exists entirely alone; everything is in relation to everything else.
author: Unknown

quote: Nothing is permanent.
author: Unknown

quote: A jug fills drop by drop.
author: Unknown

quote: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
author: Unknown

quote: One moment can change a day, one day can change a life and one life can change the world.
author: Buddha

quote: There isn’t enough darkness in all the world to snuff out the light of one little candle.
author: Unknown

quote: Imagine that every person in the world is enlightened but you. They are all your teachers, each doing just the right things to help you.
author: Unknown

quote: If you are facing in the right direction, all you need to do is keep on walking.
author: Buddha

quote: Whatever words we utter should be chosen with care for people will hear them and be influenced by them for good or ill.
author: Unknown

quote: An idea that is developed and put into action is more important than an idea that exists only as an idea.
author: Unknown

quote: Have compassion for all beings, rich and poor alike; each has their suffering. Some suffer too much, others too little.
author: Unknown

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Unknown

quote: If anything is worth doing, do it with all your heart.
author: Unknown

quote: On life’s journey faith is nourishment, virtuous deeds are a shelter, wisdom is the light by day and right mindfulness is the protection by night. If a man lives a pure life, nothing can destroy him.
author: Unknown

quote: Thousands of candles can be lit from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
author: Unknown

quote: Happiness will never come to those who fail to appreciate what they already have.
author: Buddha

quote: There is no path to happiness. Happiness is the path.
author: Unknown

quote: It is ridiculous to think that somebody else can make you happy or unhappy.
author: Unknown

quote: Happiness does not depend on what you have or who you are. It solely relies on what you think.
author: Unknown

quote: A disciplined mind brings happiness.
author: Unknown

quote: When you realize how perfect everything is you will tilt your head back and laugh at the sky.
author: Buddha

quote: Happiness is not having a lot. Happiness is giving a lot.
author: Unknown

quote: Happiness never decreases by being shared.
author: Unknown

quote: He who loves 50 people has 50 woes; he who loves no one has no woes.
author: Unknown

quote: Hatred does not cease through hatred at any time. Hatred ceases through love. This is an unalterable law.
author: Unknown

quote: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

quote: You can search throughout the entire universe for someone who is more deserving of your love and affection than you are yourself, and that person is not to be found anywhere. You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe deserve your love and affection.
author: Unknown

quote: True love is born from understanding.
author: Unknown

quote: If you truly loved yourself, you could never hurt another.
author: Unknown

quote: Love is a gift of one’s inner most soul to another so both can be whole.
author: Buddha

quote: The way is not in the sky. The way is in the heart.
author: Unknown

quote: Truth is the same always. Whoever ponders it will get the same answer. Buddha got it. Patanjali got it. Jesus got it. Mohammed got it. The answer is the same, but the method of working it out may vary this way or that.
author: Swami Satchidananda, The Yoga Sutras

quote: I guess if I had to pick a spiritual figurehead to possess the deed to the entirety of Earth, I’d go with Buddha, but only because he wouldn’t want it.
author: Sarah Vowell, Unfamiliar Fishes

quote: The words of the Buddha offer this truth: ∼ Hatred never ceases by hatred but by love alone is healed.
author: Jack Kornfield, The Art of Forgiveness, Lovingkindness, and Peace

quote: In Buddha’s opinion, to train in staying open and curious—to train in dissolving our assumptions and beliefs—is the best use of our human lives.
author: Pema Chödrön, The Pocket Pema Chodron

quote: The path of awakening begins with a step the Buddha called right understanding.
author: Jack Kornfield, Seeking the Heart of Wisdom: The Path of Insight Meditation
